thread.title: Milind Soman becomes 'Ultraman' by racing barefoot for 517 km
thread.title_full: Milind Soman becomes 'Ultraman' by racing barefoot for 517 km

author: DECCAN CHRONICLE
title: Milind Soman becomes 'Ultraman' by racing barefoot for 517 km
text:
Giving new fitness goals to the present generation (Photo: Instagram) Milind Soman has been winning hearts ever since he left millions breathless with his appearances in the 90s and a couple of decades later he is giving people fitness goal by participating in marathons and challenging triathlons as well as running between cities in his 50s.
Almost two years after he completed the toughest triathlon in the world to become Indiaâ€™s Iron Man, Milind Soman has now earned the title of Ultraman. Soman ran for 84.4 kilometres after a 10 kilometre swim and 421 kilometre bike ride, in the invite only competition.
Milind Soman did all this barefoot and faced extreme heat and a punctured tyre, as he was joined by four other Indian athletes.
